sentence: 믿을 수가 없네요... 아니 보통 이런 영화 엔딩은 국정원의 추악한 진실이 대중에게 공개되고 그걸로 인해 국장은 파멸(보통 체포되거나 체포될 것 같으니까 자살함.)하고 끝나지 않는지.. 그리고 민씨라는 양반은 그 흔한 죽은 아들이 생각나 클리셰도 없이 주인공을 돕는다니 이게 무슨 말인지. 더구나 장사질 하려고 하던 게 목적이라면서. 잘 생각은 안나는데 아예 돕는 이유 자체를 전혀 모르게(즉 어떤 근거도 내밀지 않아서 유추조차 못하게 함.) 해서 신기하게 만드는 경우는 있던데.. 보통 이런 경우 자신을 희생시키면서 주인공을 돕고 주인공이 그 이유를 물으면 "왜 그랬을까 진짜?"라며 역시 이유를 말 안하고...

Information about GANG DONG WON for those not Korean viewers.
1. Gang Dong Won is a superstar or an A list actor. Many of his movies are included in 'List of Highest-grossing Films in South Korea', according to the Korean Film Council (KOFIC).
Gang Dong Won as a bankable superstar is one of the richest actors in South Korea
2. Gang Dong Won is academically gifted with an IQ of 137 ( almost a genius), he graduated from Hanyang University with a degree in Mechanical engineering. He graduated with honors.
He also graduated from Sangmyung University with a degree in Theater and Film.
3.His father, Gang Cheol Woo, is a mechanical engineer and the vice president of SPP Heavy Industries, ranked among the top ten shipping companies worldwide.
4. In 2000 when Gang was a first year university student, he was spotted on the street by a modeling agent. Thus began his modeling career, and he appeared on the catwalk for prêt-à-porter collections in Paris such as DKNY, Gucci and Hugo Boss, as well as for the local Seoul Fashion Artists Association (SFAA).
5. Gang Dong Won is also called ''the celebrity of celebrities'' because a lot of popular Korean actresses and female singers have expressed that he is their 'ideal man'.
